entry.title: The Robins: Robin Swap
entry.summary:
Author: SpiderFan_33

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,867Chapters: 18/18Kudos: 19

Summary: In a world where Bruce Wayne is presumed dead, the Robins must work together to protect the city of Gotham while they struggle to hold their makeshift, found family together. Their fragile status quo is disrupted after Damian Wayne, newly 18 and tired of playing sidekick to Dick Grayson's Batman, and Tim Drake, recent college graduate and newly on his own as Red Robin, swap bodies. Tim gets to go back to a time when things were simpler, while Damian gets to prove he can be the solo hero Dick doubts he's ready to be. But is this mix up and dream come true or a living nightmare?

Author: ShadowedRogueBat

Summary: Damian Wayne has already gone to hell once. He has no desire to go back there, going so far as to meet with John Constantine to find a way to prevent it. If only Drake would stop sticking his pretty nose into Damian's business. Timothy Drake trusts Damian. Of course, after all this time working together, he does. But he can't help investigating when he finds Damian meeting with Constantine and sneaking away to abandoned league bases. He just wants to know what Damian is up to.
